About Me

BIO

Hi! My name is Julian and I've been living in Singapore for most of my life, but was born in Arizona. I'm currently studying Computer Engineering (B.Eng.) in NUS and I'm set to graduate in 2020.

Anything tech-related fascinates me and I love its ever-changing nature! In my free time, I enjoy hitting the gym and learning new technologies.
